name: People
body:
***
* | [Home](http://thebateslab.github.io/home/) | [Curriculum Vita](http://thebateslab.github.io/cv/) | [People](http://thebateslab.github.io/people/) |

***

###Present:

**Collaborators:**

* [Ed Gilbert](http://taxonbytes.org/ed-gilbert/): ASU Biodiversity Informatician & Faculty Research Associate

* [Dr. Peter Kennedy](http://www.cbs.umn.edu/explore/departments/eeb/faculty-research/directory/peterkennedy): Associate Professor, UMN Plant Biology Dept.

* [Dr. Linda Kinkel](http://plpa.cfans.umn.edu/people/faculty/linda-kinkel): Professor, UMN Plant Pathology Dept.

* [Dr. Andrew Miller](http://wwx.inhs.illinois.edu/directory/show/amiller): Mycologist, UIUC, Illinois Natural History Survey

* [Dr. Barbara Thiers](http://www.nybg.org/science/scientist_profile.php?id_scientist=22): Patricia K. Holmgren Director, William and Lynda Steere Herbarium

* [Erik Wardenaar](https://www.linkedin.com/pub/erik-wardenaar/8a/842/410): Assistant Portal Manager, Bell Museum of Natural History

* [Dr. Zewei Song](https://www.linkedin.com/pub/zewei-song/16/974/5b4): Postdoc Research Scholar, UMN, Plant Pathology Dept.

###Past:

**Student Workers:**

* Jenna McClay: CFANS undergraduate student, MaCC specimen digitzer

* Rebecca Gross: CFANS graduate student, MaCC specimen digitzer 

* Mara Taft: CFANS graduate student, MaCC specimen digitzer

* Neal Callinan: CFANS undergraduate student, lab personnel

* Luke Ratgen: CFANS undergraduate student, lab personnel

**Mentors:**

* [Dr. Noah Fierer](http://fiererlab.org/): Associate Professor, CU Boulder, Ecology and Evolutionary Biology

* [Dr. Ferran Garcia-Pichel](http://garcia-pichel.lab.asu.edu/labo/): Dean of Natural Sciences, ASU,  College of Liberal Arts and Sciences

* [Dr. Thomas H. Nash III](http://www.researchgate.net/profile/Thomas_Nash_Iii): Senior Scientist, UW, ASU Emeritus Professor

* [Dr. Robby Roberson](https://sols.asu.edu/people/robert-w-roberson): Associate Professor, ASU, School of Life Sciences


***
* | [Home](http://thebateslab.github.io/home/) | [Curriculum Vita](http://thebateslab.github.io/cv/) | [People](http://thebateslab.github.io/people/) |
